revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nokia |model=A036 Wireless Access Point |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/09/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX-1600N |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MXF-A910603 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3856 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Fujitsu |fla1_model=29DL323TE-90PFTN |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Mosel Vitelic |ram1_model=V54C3128164VAT7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3856 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3863 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Agere |eth_chip2_model=LU3X31T2-T64 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Nokia WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^Nokia WLAN$ |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user= |default_pass=private |oui=00:40:43 |oui_eth=00:40:43 |default_ch= }} "ENG-101-1603" and "WX1600_V03" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"ANGETEK" is silkscreened on the PoE module.
[http://lkml.indiana.edu/hypermail/linux/kernel/0307.3/0297.html '''''Nokia A036 and the GPL''''' on the '''LKML'''] (dated 2003-07-25) :The device is running Linux (kernel 2.4.17-uc0)
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual. :Additional info, per the manual... :*Default telnet credentials: root:private :*The dimensions of the device are [[Dimensions::202 mm x 152 mm x 29 mm]]. :*The weight of the device is [[Weight::350 g]].
The used OUI is per the FCC sample label.
